job_description:
Job Description:
1. Review legal documents
2. Draft contracts & legal letters
3. Conduct regulatory and legal research
4. Support compliance & licensing tasks

Requirements:
1. Major in Law
2. Understanding of legal documents and contract structures
3. Knowledge of Indonesian regulatory framework
4. Strong analytical and research skills
5. Clear and professional communication
6. Having knowledge in Regulation portals (JDIH, Kemenperin, PPID, OSS RBA) is an advantage
